old.title: Touch Typing Task(1000 Karma)
old.description: Do you know, The faster you type, the faster you communicate with others. Let's work on our rapid fingers and earn some karma. Karma points can be availed at level 126, 285, 460 and 685.

old.title: Defensive Driving Task(400 Karma)
old.description: This challenge is intended to teach you about defensive driving and how you can apply its guidelines and practices to make the roads a safer place for all road users.
